title: Amazon Robotics shuts down Blue Jay sortation project
description:
Amazon Robotics grounded the Blue Jay project after only six months, redirecting resources to other fulfillment projects.

The post Amazon Robotics shuts down Blue Jay sortation project appeared first on The Robot Report.
